observation.output:
Testing separability matrix issue...

1. Testing simple compound model:
cm = Linear1D(10) & Linear1D(5)
separability_matrix(cm) =
[[ True False]
 [False  True]]
Expected:
[[ True False]
 [False  True]]
Match: True

2. Testing complex compound model:
separability_matrix(Pix2Sky_TAN() & Linear1D(10) & Linear1D(5)) =
[[ True  True False False]
 [ True  True False False]
 [False False  True False]
 [False False False  True]]
Expected:
[[ True  True False False]
 [ True  True False False]
 [False False  True False]
 [False False False  True]]
Match: True

3. Testing nested compound model (problematic case):
separability_matrix(Pix2Sky_TAN() & cm) =
[[ True  True False False]
 [ True  True False False]
 [False False  True  True]
 [False False  True  True]]
Expected:
[[ True  True False False]
 [ True  True False False]
 [False False  True False]
 [False False False  True]]
Match: False

*** BUG REPRODUCED! ***
The nested compound model does not have the correct separability matrix.
This confirms the issue described in the bug report.
